name: DGCP | MaMeeFarm™ — Proof 414 Year-End Temperature Check Before Work
description:
This NFT represents Proof 414 from MaMeeFarm™, recorded on the final day of 2025
as part of the DGCP (Data Governance & Continuous Proof) system.

The record documents a real-world temperature and humidity check conducted
before beginning farm work on New Year's Eve. Despite being the last day
of the year, work continues as part of the uninterrupted daily discipline
of MaMeeFarm™.

Environmental data was captured directly from the field without alteration.

Observed conditions:
- Temperature: 15.7°C
- Humidity: 73%
- Time recorded: 06:36 AM
- Date: 2025-12-31

This proof is part of a continuous, day-by-day evidence chain designed to be
independently verifiable through cryptographic hashing and decentralized
time anchoring under the DGCP framework.

Location: MaMeeFarm™, Thailand
System: DGCP (Data Governance & Continuous Proof)


DGCP | MMFARM-POL-2025
